divs: sighting detailsmy sister and i were driving on interstate highway 94 to my best friend's funeral, we were near eau clair, wisconsin i was watching the clouds because i like to, and in case there would be a 'sign' from my friend. i suddenly noticed a tube-shaped cloud going the same speed we were! there were 'legs' like a centipede would have, but they were wispy, mostly. then i noticed more of them. i don't think my sister saw them because she had to drive. they were similar to contrails but without planes. they were eerie, but didn't feel evil. i had a neutral feeling about them, emotionally. but i did get video footage and one regular photo. after seeing them for about 30 minutes we stopped for gas, angled into a different direction, and i didn't see them again. they didn't make sharp turns like in the other description. i'll upload a video - if it doesn't work, it can be seen at: http:\\s283.photobucket.com\albums\kk283\gregorsamsa\clouds\?action=view¤t=wormcloudnot2x-1.flv
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Eau Claire
There were no other sightings in Eau Claire on or around March 27th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Speedy larval clouds/planeless contrails like other 08/09 WI description - video.
